adjective.description: Relating to Bologna or its people.
examples: the Bolognese painters of the 17th century

adjective.description: Denoting a sauce of ground beef, tomato, onion, and herbs, typically served with pasta.

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Bologna.
examples: the Bolognese invented tagliatelle, tortellini, and lasagna

noun.description: A pasta dish made with bolognese sauce, in particular spaghetti bolognese, or the sauce itself.
examples: I offered to cook a bolognese for lunch

origin: Italian; the form bolognaise is via French.
